snippet: Lawyers for Marc Bertoldi, owner of a luxury car business, argued that the Belgian authorities had not spelled out his precise role in the $50 million theft in February.
abstract: Marc Bertoldi, French owner of luxury car business accused of masterminding $50 million million diamond theft at Brussels Airport, temporarily fends off extradition to Belgium, arguing that authorities there have not spelled out his precise role.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Marc Bertoldi, owner of a luxury car business, argued that the Belgian authorities had not spelled out his precise role in the $50 million theft in February.

headline.seo: Frenchman Staves Off Extradition in $50 Million Diamond Theft
